com.baasbox.android

Class BaasAsset

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.baasbox.android.BaasAsset

  • public final class BaasAsset
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of functions that work with assets. Created by Andrea Tortorella on 13/03/14.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RequestToken fetchData(java.lang.String id, BaasHandler<JsonObject> handler)
      Asynchronously retrieves named assets data, If the named asset is a document, the document is retrieved otherwise attached data to the file are returned.

    • Method Detail

      • fetchData

        public static RequestToken fetchData(java.lang.String id,
                                     BaasHandler<JsonObject> handler)
        Asynchronously retrieves named assets data, If the named asset is a document, the document is retrieved otherwise attached data to the file are returned. This version of the method uses default priority.
        Parameters:
        id - the name of the asset
        handler - an handler that will be handed the response
        Returns:
        a request token

      • fetchData

        public static RequestToken fetchData(java.lang.String id,
                                     int flags,
                                     BaasHandler<JsonObject> handler)
        Asynchronously retrieves named assets data, If the named asset is a document, the document is retrieved otherwise attached data to the file are returned.
        Parameters:
        id - the name of the asset
        flags - used for the request a bit or of RequestOptions constants
        handler - an handler that will be handed the response
        Returns:
        a request token

      • fetchDataSync

        public static BaasResult<JsonObject> fetchDataSync(java.lang.String id)
        Synchronously retrieves named assets data, If the named asset is a document, the document is retrieved otherwise attached data to the file are returned.
        Parameters:
        id - the name of the asset
        Returns:
        a baas result wrapping the response.

      • streamAsset

        public static RequestToken streamAsset(java.lang.String id,
                                       BaasHandler<byte[]> handler)

      • streamAsset

        public static <R> RequestToken streamAsset(java.lang.String id,
                                           DataStreamHandler<R> data,
                                           BaasHandler<R> handler)
        Streams the file using the provided data stream handler.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type to transform the bytes to.
        Parameters:
        id - the name of the asset to download
        data - the data stream handler DataStreamHandler
        handler - the completion handler
        Returns:
        a request token to handle the request

      • streamImageAsset

        public static <R> RequestToken streamImageAsset(java.lang.String id,
                                                int size,
                                                DataStreamHandler<R> data,
                                                BaasHandler<R> handler)
        Streams the file using the provided data stream handler.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type to transform the bytes to.
        Parameters:
        id - the name of the asset to download
        size - a size spec to specify the resize of an image asset
        data - the data stream handler DataStreamHandler
        handler - the completion handler
        Returns:
        a request token to handle the request

      • streamAsset

        public static <R> RequestToken streamAsset(java.lang.String id,
                                           int flags,
                                           DataStreamHandler<R> contentHandler,
                                           BaasHandler<R> handler)
        Streams the file using the provided data stream handler.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type to transform the bytes to.
        Parameters:
        id - the name of the asset to download
        flags -
        handler - the completion handler
        Returns:
        a request token to handle the request

      • streamImageAsset

        public static <R> RequestToken streamImageAsset(java.lang.String id,
                                                int size,
                                                int flags,
                                                DataStreamHandler<R> data,
                                                BaasHandler<R> handler)
        Streams the file using the provided data stream handler.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type to transform the bytes to.
        Parameters:
        id - the name of the asset to download
        size - a size spec to specify the resize of an image asset
        flags - RequestOptions
        data - the data stream handler DataStreamHandler
        handler - the completion handler
        Returns:
        a request token to handle the request

      • streamImageAssetSync

        public static BaasResult<BaasStream> streamImageAssetSync(java.lang.String id,
                                                          java.lang.String spec)
        Synchronously streams the asset.
        Parameters:
        id - the name of the asset to download
        spec - a size spec to specify the resize of an image asset
        Returns:
        a BaasStream wrapped in a result

      • streamImageAssetSync

        public static BaasResult<BaasStream> streamImageAssetSync(java.lang.String id,
                                                          int sizeId)
        Synchronously streams the asset.
        Parameters:
        id - the name of the asset to download
        sizeId - the size index if the asset is an image
        Returns:
        a BaasStream wrapped in a result
